4) 03 March in La Coruña (Spain)

BALTASÁR PARDAL VIDAL

priest of the diocese of Santiago de Compostela;

founder, Secular Institute of the Daughters of the Nativity of Mary (n.o.)

born: 18 August 1886 in Enfesta, Santa Cristina de Fecha, La Coruña (Spain)

competent forum: Santiago de Compostela

CCS protocol number: 2149

type of cause: heroic virtues

rescript of nihil obstat: 14 December 1996

opening of diocesan inquiry: 18 December 1996

closing of diocesan inquiry: 30 November 2001

decree on validity of diocesan inquiry: 04 April 2003

publication of Positio: 2005

particular congress of theological consultors: 06 November 2010

ordinary session of cardinals and bishops: 21 February 2012

promulgation of decree on heroic virtues: 10 May 2012

postulator: Mons. Francisco Javier Froján Madero

petitioner: Hijas de la Natividad de María, Calle Don Baltasar Pardal Vidal, 1, 15001 A Coruña, SPAIN

website: causacanonizaciondonbaltasar.org;

www.lagrandeobradeatocha.com

13) 03 June in Vatican City

JOHN XXIII [ANGELO GIUSEPPE RONCALLI]

pope

born: 25 November 1881 in Sotto il Monte, Bergamo (Italy)

competent forum: Rome

CCS protocol number: 1090

type of cause: heroic virtues

opening of informative process: 1967

closing of informative process: 1974

decree on validity of informative process: 06 May 1988

ordinary session of cardinals and bishops: 19 October 1999

meeting of the Medical Board: 22 April 1999

particular congress of theological consultors: 08 January 2000

ordinary session of cardinals and bishops: 18 January 2000

promulgation of decree on miracle: 27 January 2000

subitanea, completa ac duratura sanatione Sororis Catharinae Capitani, ex Congregationem Filiarum a Caritate, a fistola enterica di ampia portata post resezione gastrica in paziente con ipertensione portale pregressa e in condizioni generali di estrema gravità die 25 mensis Maii anno 1966 in Neapoli

beatification: 03 September 2000

publication of Positio super canonizatione: 2013

ordinary session of cardinals and bishops: 02 July 2013

papal confirmation of plenary session sentence: 05 July 2013

consistory: 30 September 2013

canonization: 27 April 2014

postulator during canonization: Fra Giovangiuseppe Califano, ofm

information: Associazione Amici Papa Giovanni XXIII, Via Brusicco, 9, 24039 Sotto il Monte (BG), ITALY

website: www.papagiovanni.com
